H0.text: The city of Nizhny Novgorod was, from 1932 to 1990, named for which writer who was born there. Tolstoy

H1.text: The city of Nizhny Novgorod was, from 1932 to 1990, named for which writer who was born there. Dostoevsky

H2.text: The city of Nizhny Novgorod was, from 1932 to 1990, named for which writer who was born there. Turgenev

H3.text: The city of Nizhny Novgorod was, from 1932 to 1990, named for which writer who was born there. Gorky

A4.text: Gorky was the name of Nizhny Novgorod from 1932 to 1990.
